languages.text: {n}Старец смотрит на собеседника поверх тарелки.{/n} "Настоящий служитель должен поддерживать в себе силы, чтобы защитить Бога-Императора не только словом, но и делом".
{n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."
languages.original_text: {n}Старец смотрит на собеседника поверх тарелки.{/n} "Настоящий служитель должен поддерживать в себе силы, чтобы защитить Бога-Императора не только словом, но и делом".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old priest glances up at him over his plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words, but deeds, too. I preach in the upper city's streets. Apparently, you've never walked them."

{n}The old priest glances up at him over his plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words, but deeds, too. I preach in the upper city's streets. Apparently, you've never walked them."

{n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well. I preach in the upper city's streets. Apparently, you've never walked them."

{n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well. I preach in the upper city's streets. Apparently, you've never walked them."

{n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well. I preach in the upper city's streets. Apparently, you've never walked them."
{n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."

languages.text: {n}年迈的牧师瞪了年轻的牧师一眼。{/n}“神皇真正的仆人必须时刻积蓄力量。这样一来，不仅可以通过言语布道，更可以通过行动来展现忠诚。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}年迈的牧师瞪了年轻的牧师一眼。{/n}“神皇真正的仆人必须时刻积蓄力量。这样一来，不仅可以通过言语布道，更可以通过行动来展现忠诚。我是在上城区的大街小巷里布道的，而很显然，你根本没亲自去过那些街道。”

languages.text: {n}老司祭は皿越しに仲間を一瞥した。{/n}「信仰に仕える真の者は、神帝陛下に言葉だけでなく行いも捧げられるよう、力を蓄えておかねばならぬのだ。」
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}老司祭は皿越しに仲間を一瞥した。{/n}「信仰に仕える真の者は、神帝陛下に言葉だけでなく行いも捧げられるよう、力を蓄えておかねばならぬのだ。私は上層区の街路で説教している。君はどうやらそこを一度も歩いたことがないようだな」

languages.text: {n}El viejo sacerdote echa una mirada furtiva a su compañero por encima de su plato.{/n} «Un verdadero siervo de la fe debe conservar sus fuerzas para honrar al Dios Emperador con sus actos además de sus palabras».
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}El viejo sacerdote echa una mirada furtiva a su compañero por encima de su plato.{/n} «Un verdadero siervo de la fe debe conservar sus fuerzas para honrar al Dios Emperador con sus actos además de sus palabras. Yo predico en las calles del nivel superior de la ciudad. Es evidente que no has paseado nunca por ellas».

languages.text: {n}Yaşça büyük olan rahip, tabağının üzerinden arkadaşına bakış atıyor.{/n} "İnancın gerçek hizmetkârları gücünü korumalıdır ki Tanrı İmparator'a yalnızca sözde değil, fiilen de hizmet edebilsin."
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşça büyük olan rahip, tabağının üzerinden arkadaşına bakış atıyor.{/n} "İnancın gerçek hizmetkârları gücünü korumalıdır ki Tanrı İmparator'a yalnızca sözde değil, fiilen de hizmet edebilsin. Ben üst şehrin sokaklarında vaaz veriyorum. Belli ki oraya hiç çıkmamışsın."

languages.text: {n}Le vieux prêtre lance un bref coup d'œil à son compagnon par-dessus son assiette.{/n} « Un véritable serviteur de la foi doit préserver ses forces afin d'offrir à l'Empereur-Dieu non seulement ses paroles, mais aussi ses actes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieux prêtre lance un bref coup d'œil à son compagnon par-dessus son assiette.{/n} « Un véritable serviteur de la foi doit préserver ses forces afin d'offrir à l'Empereur-Dieu non seulement ses paroles, mais aussi ses actes. Je prêche dans les rues de la ville haute. Apparemment, vous n'y avez jamais mis les pieds. »

languages.text: {n}Der alte Priester wirft seinem Gefährten über den Teller einen Blick zu.{/n} "Ein wahrer Diener des Glaubens muss kräftig bleiben, damit er dem Gottimperator nicht nur Worte anbieten kann, sondern auch Taten."
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest shoots his companion a glance over the plate.{/n} "A true servant of the faith must keep his strength up so that he may offer the God-Emperor not just words but deeds as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Priester wirft seinem Gefährten über den Teller einen Blick zu.{/n} "Ein wahrer Diener des Glaubens muss kräftig bleiben, damit er dem Gottimperator nicht nur Worte anbieten kann, sondern auch Taten. Ich predige in den Straßen der Oberstadt. Dort seid Ihr aber offenkundig niemals gewesen."
